title: rest in peace
body: i will always remember you, solo lane mordekaiser, i will always remember you. goodbye, old friend

replies.body:
What might help you deal with your grief is to actually play him in solo lanes where he can still do well..  just because a champ isn't optimised for a certain position doesn't mean they are useless. 

TF is optimised for mid because his ult can reach both top and bot lanes and his AP scaling is good, yet Adc bot TF is still played, sure he cant ult top lane anymore and his Q is basically for looks only, yet that still is played with success. 

morde is the same, so one (non-ultimate) ability requires another person? so what? 
ever seen kalista top or mid? i know i have, her ult her bloody R requires another person, morde's W is a tiny price to pay in comparison.

adjust your build a bit of course but thats what the game is about.
i did play him in a solo lane and things went very badly for me, it just felt as if mordekaiser lost his feel and his harass is now very poor in my opinion. or maybe i just had a bad game.

I play mid and top Soraka and support Veigar with success. You just had a bad game.

Any champ can go any role (except the elitist jungle that only belongs to those elite few champs) if you build correctly.
ye i know what you mean, i like to play j4 support and i was one of the few who played ap ezreal before the foul runeglaive came about
